summary: Premium offline OSM Navigation for Android Wear

description: The first osm offline map & navigator for the Android Wear operation system. In order to get to any location just use the navigation on watch. It is simple and easy to use and a great helper for on the go. Download now for free. To start the app. Just say: OK Google...Start osm navigation.Features:- Offline map- Offline navigation on watch- Download OSM maps for germany- Save location targets in a list- Use voice commands to navigate to a target locationYou have to own an Android Wear device to use this appCurrently compatible devices:► HUAWEI Watch► Moto 360 Gen 2 (2015)► Moto 360 Gen 1 (2014)► Asus Zenwatch► LG G Watch► LG G Watch R► LG G Watch Urbane (Android Wear version)► Samsung Gear Live► Sony SmartWatch 3Please note:-Make sure your mobile is compatible with Android Wear.-Make sure to pair your phone with the wearable device with help of the Android Wear app.-To open: Go to "Start..." and open the app "OSM Navigation" or say "Start OSM Navigation"Do you have any suggestions for improvement? Any ideas? Any issues with the app? Please let us know.
descriptionHTML:
The first osm offline map & navigator for the Android Wear operation system. In order to get to any location just use the navigation on watch. It is simple and easy to use and a great helper for on the go. Download now for free. To start the app. Just say: OK Google...Start osm navigation.


Features:
- Offline map
- Offline navigation on watch
- Download OSM maps for germany
- Save location targets in a list
- Use voice commands to navigate to a target location


You have to own an Android Wear device to use this app
Currently compatible devices:
► HUAWEI Watch
► Moto 360 Gen 2 (2015)
► Moto 360 Gen 1 (2014)
► Asus Zenwatch
► LG G Watch
► LG G Watch R
► LG G Watch Urbane (Android Wear version)
► Samsung Gear Live
► Sony SmartWatch 3


Please note:
-Make sure your mobile is compatible with Android Wear.
-Make sure to pair your phone with the wearable device with help of the Android Wear app.
-To open: Go to "Start..." and open the app "OSM Navigation" or say "Start OSM Navigation"


Do you have any suggestions for improvement? Any ideas? Any issues with the app? Please let us know.
